#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#define maxn 1000100
#define LL long long
#define CLR(x) memset(x,0,sizeof(x))
using namespace std;
int a[maxn];
int main()
{
    int n,m;
    while(~scanf("%d%d",&m,&n))
    {
        int shu=0;
        for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
            shu=max(shu,a[i]);
        }
        if(n&1)
        {
            if(shu>(n+1)/2)
                printf("NO\n");
            else
                printf("YES\n");
        }
        else
        {
            if(shu>n/2)
                printf("NO\n");
            else
                printf("YES\n");
        }
    }
}
